title: 话说升到lv6你们用了多久啊
author: howlandhhy
txt_content: 之前那一个号绑定的邮箱记不到了T.T 有没有人可以给个大概的时间呢

replies.author: 陈皮_no橘皮
replies.txt_content: 我升级从来都是随缘。

replies.author: Minecraft.Wnxi
replies.txt_content: 忘记了，可能才一个星期吧。

replies.author: 傻梦死肥宅
replies.txt_content: 不多不多，也就两三年吧（常年不上线的）

replies.author: aweidada
replies.txt_content: 2年了 还在5级

replies.author: wishdsb
replies.txt_content: 几个月吧，多水水还是蛮块的

replies.author: Earfreet
replies.txt_content: 我当时用了一个月

replies.author: 凌幺
replies.txt_content: 纯签到两年……

replies.author: LeCorbusier
replies.txt_content: 想升六级啊

replies.author: piao_xue
replies.txt_content: 1年吧     其实活跃几个月就能升级了

replies.author: Satisfied扬扬
replies.txt_content: 也就个两三年而已hhhh

replies.author: qq3359430875
replies.txt_content: 2年了= =其实就是懒得做任务 天天签到才6级

replies.author: LZDMC
replies.txt_content: 不经常来0.0

replies.author: BigKillBla
replies.txt_content: 我感觉我很快就能升到
到都没到。。。

replies.author: 二八剑姬
replies.txt_content: 这等级挺难升的，多氵吧

replies.author: 小灬望
replies.txt_content: 回归后1周就ok

replies.author: 缘若轻殇
replies.txt_content: 不好说，就看你氵不氵了

replies.author: 色我也空
replies.txt_content: 我见过两天五级的 六级不知道

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 木大攻
replies.txt_content:
啊这
很长一段时间都没升级
硬要说应该是几年？？

replies.author: Wudji
replies.txt_content: 1年多

replies.author: MC小库
replies.txt_content:
我用了七年（迫真
其实是13年注册中间好几年没玩MC然后回归的时候做服务器水到了6）

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 三天六级，一周七级

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content: 一左右吧，就一直签到

replies.author: 空条徐伦...
replies.txt_content: 我花了17天 终于上了 niiiiice

replies.author: 伟大的小安
replies.txt_content: 3天啊，这里的人都知道

replies.author: 空条徐伦...
replies.txt_content: 17天 今天到了6级

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: 大概一两周
我用了七年=。=、 还是五级

replies.author: LeCorbusier
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft.Wnxi 发表于 2020-8-16 15:43
忘记了，可能才一个星期吧。
大佬是怎么水上去的

replies.author: DarkParadise11
replies.txt_content: 4年才升到5级，你看看这，我太懒了

replies.author: Haakon
replies.txt_content: 我六年了，我五级了！

replies.author: 是天一丫
replies.txt_content: 看缘分，想上学的时候就做做任务

replies.author: MiShit
replies.txt_content: 其实也不是很快，也就六年还没到。
我2014年注册的，用了3年

replies.author: TheSound
replies.txt_content: 十分可怕，我以为只签到就可以升级，没想要做任务和水贴最快

replies.author: 天空的大楼
replies.txt_content: 我记得也是用了几个月升到6级的。

replies.author: onokazu
replies.txt_content: 我才1级...

replies.author: BakaXD
replies.txt_content: 还没到呢, 正在路上

replies.author: Cutter_
replies.txt_content: 很快，估计一个月
不久，眼睛一睁一闭就到6了

replies.author: sincerin
replies.txt_content: 只签到啥都不做要2年这样

replies.author: MateShowGod
replies.txt_content: 也就2 3 天左右

replies.author: 帅280
replies.txt_content: 感觉得半年

replies.author: xykmt
replies.txt_content: 8.。。年了 我还在4级

replies.author: qq3511891598
replies.txt_content: 佛家说的话，一切皆有缘

replies.author: 阿尔法1222
replies.txt_content: 什么lv6，我只知道lv5有七（六）个人（话题错）

replies.author: Mew_Ming
replies.txt_content: 哈哈哈哈哈,我用了很多年.....

replies.author: qq320611406
replies.txt_content: 你看看我，多长时间？我都不记得已经注册多长时间了。

replies.author: piastic
replies.txt_content: 几个月 ？还没升6

replies.author: Mr_fengfeng
replies.txt_content: 鬼知道用了多久可能2到3个月吧=-=我也不是大水怪=-=

replies.author: 5中生有
replies.txt_content: 随缘吧，就每天做做任务了

replies.author: 黎明Gi
replies.txt_content: 升级随缘吧

replies.author: shadow_xiaoguai
replies.txt_content: 都是随缘签到的 随缘升级的 不知不觉就6级了

replies.author: 阿黎Nya
replies.txt_content: 还...还没氵上六级呢

replies.author: wsldd_2
replies.txt_content: 在三级徘徊三个月的我

replies.author: 062desu
replies.txt_content: 在努力了在努力了 这个月内我应该也六级了
